name: Meta (macro_scenery)
description:
A game about a traveller

A game about inaction

A game about me

A game about you

A game....

I hope you're happy...

This is my first time doing a game jam and I didn't really do that well. This game is a lesson in time management. So I give you this thing as a lesson. Always plan ahead, and feel good about producing broken things. It shows you made progress
